divs: sighting detailssimular incident happened 3 times from 2000- 2012. each time i was taking a picture of a dog, each time i lose reception tv\radio 1st time i caught figures in photo, last two times were closer and slowed image down in camera. looks like delayed apeture. i point diffrent direction and ok. each time i realized it was in photo afterward and deleated some photos. i have from 2012, one from 2000 thats a copy off my printer. originals should be on floppies. the thing looks like a gray and i was 4ft from it. tell me if it is real? 2000 photo was 12 ft away. it was tranlucent then with a good outline, showing reflection of eyes, some sort of slight light and script symbol that i first thought was a five. the odd thing is back then one of the photos had a outline of others behined. from that i could draw a guess of what it looked like. so i was suprised in 2012 it looked like it. with exception of no ridges around eyes. now i dont know what to think is it real or not? we have had strange activity here for years off and on. would usually pick up when someone or dog would stay or visit. new dog last year. then i realized something what if it is teritorial that would explain it. also this yesr somthing new the most brilliant display of light that looked like a cut gemstone. white on bottom then purple and blue on top with white pulsing upward in lines. i walked up to it closed my eyes could see reflection like sunlight with them closed. opened eyes and ran for a camera and it was gone. alot more has happened here i should share but unsure if i should. also i have been ill since 2000 and i have wondered numerous times if somthing was making me that way. severe vetigo, dizziness, stiff muscles and headaches
Summary: if its a alien? unsure. then got it 3 times since 2000, weird stuff thought unrelated
trends: There have been no other sightings in Central City
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
